text.author: Wikivoyage community (see URL)
text.title: Kupang

p.s:
is a city in
West Timor
and the provincial capital of
East Nusa Tenggara
.

text.s: ( KOE Bandar Udara El Tari ) , Jl .

Has services to
Surabaya
,
Denpasar
,
Jakarta
,
Maumere
,
Ende
and many other remote regions in
East Nusa Tenggara
.
Air Timor has services to Dili three times per week .

p.s: There is a ' Coco Taxi ' operating .
A trip from airport to town should be IDR 50,000-80,000 .

Kupang is a 12-hour bus ride away from
Dili
,
East Timor
.
Soé is a 3 hour bus ride .
The uniqueness of public transportation in the city of Kupang is due to the appearance filled with accessories , decorations and music blaring .
Each bemo is manned by a driver and an assistant who collects the money from passengers .
You can tell the assistant your destination / drop-off point in advance .
There are multiple routes , so you need to ask your accommodations if any of the bemos are are passing by your destinations .
Within Kupang the route number can be seen on top of the bemo , whereas for further destination , it will write the destination name .
Each trip is IDR 3,000 ( as of Dec 2018 ) .

Ride-hailing app such as
Grab
and
Go-Jek
is getting more popular here , but you may need to wait a little bit more as the number of drivers are still growing ( as of Dec 2018 ) .

item.s: ( Pantai Lasiana ) .
Famous for its white sand .
There are n't many buildings , so you can enjoy the natural beach .

p.s: If you like loud music , you can try " Diskotek Berjalan " style of Kupang .

item.s: , Kupang ( Timor ) .
If you are in Kupang a visit to the Roslin Orphanage is a definite must .
Google and youtube " Roslin Orphanage " for more information .
Peggy and Budi Soehardi are CNN heroes and once you read about their story , you will understand why .
There were some controversies about their volunteers recently , but just go there and decide for yourself .
, Jl . WJ Lalamentik .
A water-amusement park .
( Pasar Oeba ) ( Bemo #6 , #10 passing by this market . ) .
A traditional market next to a pier selling daily needs .
Tourists will receive a moderate attention here .
, Jl . WJ Lalamentik .
The largest mall in area is the Ramayana Department Store which includes shops , food courts , games and other facilities .
Flobamora
Mall is a family mall concept to provide all the needs of the family in one place .
, Jl .
El Tari II Bundaran PU , ☏ +623808585060 .
two-floor shopping center with Matahari Dept Store and Hypermarket .
, Jl .
Beachside restaurant with lots of choices including seafood .
You can enjoy this dish in huts on the seafront
, Jl .
Also beachside restaurant which served delicious seafood .
Here you can eat grilled banana with a variety of flavors while enjoying the beautiful beach and the sound of waves
: along the sidewalk on the Jalan El Tari ( in front of the Governor 's office ) .
' Depot Bambu Kuning ' and ' Se'i Babi Aroma ' ( two branches ) are the two most popular places to have Se'i Babi .
: Every night there is a street food market centred around Jalan Kosasih , not far from the shore .
The stalls fry up lots of fresh seafood - fish , lobsters , crabs , etc. , while the tahu tempe penyet is a great vegetarian option .
Next to the food stalls are drinks stations where the best options are the fresh juice .
Juice avokap ( avocado juice ) and jus naga ( dragonfruit juice ) are especially common and are blended with ice , sugar , and sweetened condensed milk/chocolate syrup .
, Jalan Gunung Meja .
Check-out : 1pm . A three-storey hotel that has seen better days .
However , private rooms with bathrooms and AC are available for a good price .
It 's not far from the central bus terminal and the night street food market .
The staff are friendly though no English is spoken .
Free tea and coffee in the morning .
Free Wifi is available around the reception area .
Standard fan Rp100,000 , Standard AC Rp125,000 , Deluxe AC Rp150,000 .

A backpacker spot with a friendly English-speaking staff , who will answer any question about flights , buses and ferries , flyers and maps on other hostels in Roti and
East Timor
, and is a good place to meet other backpackers with whom you can talk and share information .

text.s: Dorm IDR 70,000 ; Fan IDR 160,000 ; A/C IDR 260,000 .

item.s: , Jl .

A three-star international hotel in the heart of Kupang , 20 minutes from El Tari Airport , the hotel allows easy access to the business and government district as well as some of the most noteworthy sites in the vicinity .
, Jl .
Three-star hotel with the concept of transit and business .
the highland area to visit traditional village in Boti and None .
3 hours .
First take the bemo to ' Noelbakul ' destination , and then stop at Oesapa " bus stop " .
You can find " Travel " shared car for IDR 50,000 or bus for IDR 30,000 ( Bus to Kefamenanu will pass by Soe too , ask the bus assistant ) .
No ferry from Kupang to Dili is running as of January 22 , 2012 .
The most common way to go to Dili is via land ( 12 hours ) .
Flight route of Kupang-Dili is available in 2018 .
( Note : As of May 26 , 2015 , all EU passport holders ( except Ireland or UK ) no longer need a visa to East Timor .
Otherwise , for all nationalities except Indonesian , a free ' Visa Authorisation Letter ' must be obtained from the East Timorese Consulate prior to reaching the land border ) .
